scripts.clean: docker rm $(docker ps -a -q) 2>/dev/null; docker rm -f freelance 2>/dev/null; echo all clean
scripts.mysql-start: docker pull mysql:5.5.46 && docker run -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -e MYSQL_DATABASE=mydatabase --name mysql -d -p 3306:3306 mysql:5.5.46
scripts.mysql-fresh-start: npm run clean-mysql; npm run mysql-start && sleep 15s && npm run mysql-import
scripts.mysql-import: docker cp mysql-dump-import.sh mysql:/ && docker cp dump.tmp mysql:/dump.sql && docker exec mysql sh /mysql-dump-import.sh /dump.sql
scripts.php-start: docker run -d -v $(pwd):/var/www/html -p 80:80 --link mysql:mysql.mydatabase -e MYSQL_DATABASE=mysql.mydatabase -e APP_ENV=dev --name=freelance freelance
scripts.mysql-dump-import: docker cp mysql-dump-import.sh mysql:/ && docker cp $npm_package_config_dumpfile mysql:/dump.sql && docker exec mysql sh mysql-dump-import.sh /dump.sql
scripts.go_old: npm run build && npm run clean && npm run php-mysql-start && npm run mysql-dump-import &&npm run mysql-phpmyadmin
scripts.step1: npm run mysql-fresh-start && sleep 15s && npm run mysql-phpmyadmin
scripts.step2: npm run php-build && sleep 15s && npm run php-start
scripts.step3: npm run get-memcached && sleep 15s && npm run link-memcached
